name: Butter Chicken
cooking_process: Marinate chicken in a mix of spices and yogurt, grill until golden. In a separate pan, sauté tomatoes, onions, ginger, and garlic. Add cream, butter, and spices to the pan and cook until the sauce thickens. Add the chicken to the sauce and cook until tender.

name: Palak Paneer
cooking_process: Blanch spinach and puree it. Sauté onions, tomatoes, and spices in a separate pan. Add the pureed spinach to the pan and cook for a few minutes. Add the paneer and cook until the sauce thickens.

name: Chole Bhature
cooking_process: Soak chickpeas overnight, cook them in a pressure cooker with spices. For the bhatura, mix flour, yogurt, and spices. Knead the dough and let it rest for a few hours. Roll out the dough and deep-fry the bhaturas. Serve with chole.

name: Rajma Chawal
cooking_process: Soak kidney beans overnight, cook them in a pressure cooker with spices. Cook rice separately. Sauté onions, tomatoes, and spices in a separate pan. Add the cooked kidney beans to the pan and cook until the sauce thickens. Serve with rice.

name: Samosa
cooking_process: Boil potatoes, mash them, and add peas and spices. Make dough from flour, water, and oil. Roll out the dough and cut it into circles. Fill the circles with the potato mixture, fold them into triangles, and deep-fry them.

name: Chicken Biryani
cookingProcess: 1. Marinate chicken in spices and yogurt. 2. Cook rice and fry onion. 3. Layer rice, chicken, and fried onion in a pot. 4. Cook on low heat until done. 5. Serve hot with raita.

name: Aloo Gobi
cookingProcess: 1. Parboil potatoes and cauliflower. 2. Saute onion and tomatoes in spices. 3. Add potatoes and cauliflower. 4. Cook until tender. 5. Serve hot with rice or naan.

name: Paneer Tikka
cookingProcess: 1. Marinate paneer and vegetables in spices and yogurt. 2. Grill until charred. 3. Serve hot with chutney.

name: Masala Dosa
cooking_process: Soak urad dal, idli rice, and fenugreek seeds for 6 hours. Grind to a smooth batter and ferment overnight. Add salt and mix well. Heat a non-stick pan, pour a ladleful of batter and spread it in a circular motion. Drizzle oil and cook till crisp. Flip and cook the other side. Serve hot with sambar and chutney.

name: Tandoori Chicken
ingredients: 1 whole chicken, skin removed and cleaned
cooking_process: Mix yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, garam masala, turmeric powder, salt, and red chili powder. Marinate the chicken in the mixture for 6 hours. Preheat the oven to 450°F. Thread the chicken pieces onto skewers and place on a baking tray. Roast for 20-25 minutes, until cooked through. Serve hot with mint chutney.

name: Mutton Kacchi
cooking_process: Marinate the mutton in yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, and spices for 6 hours. Soak the rice in water for 30 minutes. Heat ghee in a large pot, add onions and fry till golden brown. Add the marinated mutton and cook for 10 minutes. Layer the rice over the mutton, add saffron milk and seal the pot with dough. Cook on low heat for 45 minutes. Serve hot with raita.

name: Barfi
cooking_process: Grease a pan with ghee. Heat ghee in a pan, add milk powder and roast for 3-4 minutes. Add heavy cream, sugar, and cardamom powder. Mix well and cook for 5-6 minutes, stirring continuously. Pour the mixture into the greased pan, and spread evenly. Garnish with chopped nuts and let it cool for 2-3 hours. Cut into pieces and serve.
